name: Amazement Family Faces
effectText: Target 1 monster your opponent controls equipped with your "Attraction" Trap(s); equip this card to it. While this card is equipped to a monster, take control of the equipped monster. While you control the equipped monster, it gains 500 ATK, you cannot activate its effects, also it is treated as an "Amazement" monster. You can only activate 1 "Amazement Family Faces" per turn.
